statements: DELETE FROM satellite_locations WHERE latitude > 30 AND longitude < -100;
DELETE FROM satellite_locations WHERE longitude > -100 AND latitude < 40;
DELETE FROM satellite_history WHERE location = 'Space Station Alpha';
DELETE FROM satellite_history WHERE location = 'Space Station' AND TIMESTAMP < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM SatelliteLocations WHERE location_id = 100 AND satellite_id = 2;
DELETE FROM tracking_stations WHERE location = 'SpaceX HQ';
DELETE FROM satellites WHERE category = 'weather' AND launch_date < '2020-01-01'
